reporting-org.narrative: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre

title.narrative: Treating wounded and injured Yemenis in the public and private sectors in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

description.narrative: Providing full medical care for the wounded and injured Yemenis in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, reducing the complications of their injuries, rehabilitating them and engaging them in civil society.

Treating the wounded and injured Yemenis in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia by providing all therapeutic and diagnostic services, operations, rehabilitation and follow-up according to the treatment plan for each wounded and injured separately, and securing accommodation.

participating-org.narrative: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre
King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre
